article.headline: DePaul 83, Chicago State 56
article.story: ROSEMONT, Ill. (AP) -- Karron Clarke led DePaul with 15 points and the Blue Demons beat Chicago State 83-56 Wednesday night to post consecutive wins for the first time this season. Wilson Chandler scored 10 points while Sammy Mejia and Will Walker each added eight for DePaul (4-4). Junior David Holston led the Cougars (3-6) with 12 points. The diminutive guard was the only Chicago State player to reach double-figures. DePaul opened the second half with a 21-13 run to grab a 59-39 lead on Wesley Green's fadeaway jumper. The lead peaked at 30 points in the closing minutes. With Clarke scoring nine points on 4-for-4 shooting from the field, including a fastbreak alley-oop, DePaul took a 36-26 advantage at the half. Chicago State kept pace with the Blue Demons for the first 10 minutes of the game before DePaul went on a 14-4 run to open up a 30-19 lead. DePaul held the Cougars to 31 percent shooting in the first half, using a decided height advantage to block seven shots and win the rebound battle 24-14. Chicago State, which has lost three straight, never has beaten DePaul -- losing all eight contests in the series. The win, coupled with last weekend's upset of then-No. 5 Kansas, puts the Blue Demons in position to have a winning record for the first time this year if they win Saturday at Alabama-Birmingham.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
